If you're suggesting that there is/was no rule on the rules page 
about that, you'd be correct. It should have gone up a long time ago 
(back when Yan was RPing) but for some reason it didn't get added to 
the rules. Besides, mach 1 is quite fast as it is. I've added that 
rule to the page.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> If I get on the council I'm putting this on the rules page:
> 
> If anyone tells you about a rule you didn't remember double check 
> this.  If it isn't here it doesn't apply so just cuss them out and 
be 
> on your way.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > SS is flying at Mach 1 because that's the airborn speed limit. 
> > Ground speeds max out at half the airspeeds. Note that for the 
> > futur. =)
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > SS follows at Mach 5.
